means: 报复心驱使的，图谋报复的

sentence.Network_en: He was stabbed to death by his vengeful wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被图谋报复的妻子拿刀捅死了。

sentence.Network_en: The whole episode made me vengeful.
sentence.Network_cn: 整个事件使我一心想复仇.

sentence.Network_en: He did not think he was any more cruel, any more vengeful than other men.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为自己并不比其他人更冷酷，也不比别人更爱报复。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... vengeance 报仇，报复 vengeful 报复的，复仇心理的 venom 毒液；恶毒，痛恨.
以v开头的英语英文单词 ... venetian 威尼斯城的 vengeful 复仇心重的,报复的 venice 威尼斯(意大利港市).
希望英语杂志单词_百度知道 ... tusk 长牙 vengeful 复仇的 sneak 偷偷地走潜行.
venery 性欲的vengeful 有报仇心理的venous pulse 静脉脉搏

list.abs: It looked at you with a vengeful aspect ., 它用一种报仇雪恨的神情望着你.
because if he was not vengeful ., 因为如果他没有报复心.
in financial terms , this is like a newly vengeful beast jumping back into the movie script , to reattack the robot .站在金融业的角度讲，这就像电影剧本里又跳出一个前来图谋报复的恶棍，再次对机器人发动攻击。
from the depths of the wilderness they come , with sharpened claws and vengeful rage .他们从荒野深处而来，所有的只有锋锐的利爪和复仇的怒火。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete venge 'avenge' (see vengeance), on the pattern of revengeful

entry.tran: 有复仇心理的；图谋报复的;想报仇的
entry.def: If you describe someone as vengeful, you are critical of them because they feel a great desire for revenge.

example.ex: He was stabbed to death by his vengeful wife...
example.tran: 他被图谋报复的妻子拿刀捅死了。

example.ex: He did not think he was any more cruel, any more vengeful than other men.
example.tran: 他认为自己并不比其他人更冷酷，也不比别人更爱报复。

means.word_mean: 1. disposed to seek revenge or intended for revenge;

auth_sentence.content: A vengeful...public, its temper whetted by...sensational journalism.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ithaca what he sees before him is a vengeful illusion.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 复仇心重的, [利于]报复的
stems_affixes.word_buile: venge惩罚[引申为报仇]+ful充满……的→充满惩罚的心→复仇心重的
revenge[n.报复,复仇 v.替…报仇]+ful充满……的→adj.报复的,深藏仇恨的
re反+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→反惩罚→报仇
venge惩罚[引申为报仇]+ance表名词→n.报复,报仇,复仇
a加强动作+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→v.为…复仇,为…报仇
re反+venge惩罚[引申为报仇]→反惩罚→报仇

means.word_mean: 报复心驱使的;图谋报复的
